description: Try our easy to follow Warm Creamy Coconut Rice With Mango & Lime recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice pudding,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Warm Creamy Coconut Rice With Mango & Lime Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 mango, stoned, peeled and cut into small chunks
1 lime, finely grated rind and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rice in a heavy-based saucepan with the sugar, milk and coconut milk. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes until the rice has swelled and thickened.
Meanwhile, place the mango in a bowl and mix with the lime rind and juice.
Spoon the cooked rice into serving bowls and place spoonfuls of the mango and lime mixture into the centre of each.
